SHOP_INSTRUCTIONS: You can buy with: `{{prefix}}buy <id|name|itemId> [amount]` or `{{prefix}}moxishop buy <id|name|itemId> [amount]`.
NOT_FOUND_BY_ID: No item exists with ID {{id}}. Use .moxishop list to see IDs.
NOT_FOUND_GENERIC: I couldn't find that item in the shop. Use .moxishop list to see IDs.
INVALID_PRICE: This item can't be bought (invalid price).
